question:
You are applying for a Job and need a letter of reference. 
Write a letter to a former teacher. In your letter:
•	Give details of the job•	Explain why it is important to you•	Suggest what information your teacher could put in the reference.
text: The reason for writing this letter is that I have required a recommendation letter from your side for the job purpose, as I have recently found out one opportunity in the newspaper that was on last week and it is related to my field of interest. I am Aisha, I am a recent graduate from the engineering department.

Firstly, this work is very similar and much more indulge with my core and my majors like it involve mostly calculations, design and structure and also some kind of maps. Furthermore, the workplace location is ideal for me to reach  out on a regular basis as I can commute there very easily.

Additionally, this career-boosting opportunity will add to my overall technical as well as personal skills. Moreover, it can take me up to the level of highly demanding and highly paid jobs. lastly, I will be able to excel in my performance so that I can earn more incentives.
In the last, I would like you to please add all the classes related to courses that I have learned from you as well as different software and training attended during my entire university tenure.
I look forward to hearing from your side.
